name: Toby's World
description:
FEATURES

  • 5 characters, each with an unique skill
  • Beautiful HD graphics
  • Play through 70 levels, each with an unique design
  • Make use of the anti-gravity device
  • More than 20 types of enemies

CONTROLS

  • Player's movement - Navigation keys
  • Pause - Pause key
  • Item supply exchange - S
  • Laser gun - Z
